```{r load_packages, echo = FALSE}
library(xtable)
library(ggplot2)
library(emod)
```

```{r load_loss_data, echo = FALSE}
loss <- read.csv(file = "loss_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
payroll <- data.frame(class = c("8868", "9101"),
                      payroll = c(50000000, 10000000)
                      )
member <- "Any County"
```

`r member` E-mod Calculation

```{r run_emod, echo=FALSE}
losses <- loss_ncci(year = loss$year,
                    type = loss$type,
                    incurred = loss$net_incurred
                    )

my_emod <- emod(losses, payroll)
my_emod
```
